snippet: The board of the broken Massachusetts health insurance exchange voted to buy new software to help people enroll in coverage, while preparing to join the federal marketplace if necessary.
abstract: Board of broken Massachusetts health insurance exchange votes to buy new software to help people enroll in coverage, while also preparing to join the federal marketplace if there is a delay in getting the system up and running.
lead_paragraph: The board of the broken Massachusetts health insurance exchange voted to buy new software to help people enroll in coverage, while preparing to join the federal marketplace if necessary.

headline.main: Massachusetts Pushes Fix for State Health Exchange
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Pushes Fix for State Health Exchange

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
